org.jetel.graph.runtime.jmx

Interface InputPortTracking

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PortTracking, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InputPortTrackingDetail

    public interface InputPortTracking
extends PortTracking
    Interface for the tracking information about component's input port. This interface should be used by JMX clients. Each change of this interface (rename, delete or add of an attribute) should be reflected in TrackingMetadataToolkit class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jetel.graph.runtime.jmx.PortTracking

        PortTracking.PortType
